channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Do you need to clean your water bottles frequently?
Want to test how strong is your relationship? TikTok’s Bird Theory could give you the answer
This Week in Explainers: How NDA pulled off ‘is baar 200 paar’ in Bihar
History Today: When Benazir Bhutto shattered barriers to become Pakistan's first woman PM
RJD won the most votes in Bihar. So why did it lose the election?
Is Pakistan quietly engaging with Israel?
Terror’s urban avatar: How India can win the new proxy war
item.description: A plot stretching from Srinagar to Delhi reveals how terror has evolved; professionalised, networked, and aimed as much at social trust as at physical targets

item.title: Asim Munir’s constitutional coup exposes the hollowness of Pakistan’s democracy
item.description: Democracies survive because institutions can push the pack, when those institutions are hollowed out and become executive-dependent, the only check left is the market for international censure

item.title: Narnaul: A Haryana town lulled to sleep by its own history tales
item.description: Narnaul is a town where layers of forgotten history lie hidden in plain sight — from Sher Shah Sur’s grand legacy to Akbar’s mint and Rao Tula Ram’s rebellion — yet travellers pass it by, unaware of its remarkable past

item.title: West’s deafening silence on Pakistan’s funeral of democracy
item.description: The West’s backing of Asim Munir will not stop even if Pakistan gets balkanised so as to balance an emerging India—the Pakistani military has once again played the right cards to become their best bet

item.title: What a troubled neighbourhood means for India
item.description: Whether it is the importation, re-routing or out-sourcing of Kashmir-centric cross-border terrorism, or the mere arrival of a mass of refugees, including Rohingyas, India needs to be guarded all the time

item.title: A city gasping: When will Delhi demand clean air?
item.description: Scientists estimate that air pollution in Delhi reduces an average life by almost a decade
